TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含用于为工作流设计图面上的所有根设计器提供一致外观的属性和方法。

span.span: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 通常，顺序工作流根设计器类的实例在工作流设计器中创建工作流时创建，它表示用户可在其中添加和编辑活动的设计图面。Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities. 工作流根设计器没有父设计器，除非它是 活动的子级。A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an activity. 所有工作流根设计器都必须从 派生。All workflow root designers must derive from .

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示 能否设置为与设计器关联的活动的父级。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.

returns.span: 为 则允许与 关联的活动成为与 关联的活动的父级；否则为 。

span.span: to allow the activity associated with to be the parent of the activity associated with the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在工作流设计图面上，根设计器不能有父活动设计器。Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface. 除非在继承类中重写，否则 将返回 `false`。Unless overridden in an inheriting class, returns `false`.

value.span: 表示与 关联的页脚的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的内容显示在工作流设计图面上根设计器的底部。The contents of appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface. 页脚中可显示图标和文本，其中包括当用户选择其中之一时更改设计器视图的按钮图标。Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用适当的主题设置来绘制要在页眉和页脚中包含的任何文本。 draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings. 此外，它还绘制要在页眉和页脚中包含的任何图像。It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers. **请注意**当重写在派生类中，一定要调用方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。**Note** When you override in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根设计器标题区通常包含页眉以及与设计器关联的任何图标。A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer. 通过获取其基实现的值并添加为 定义的高度（整数值），计算它所返回的整数。 calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the .
